sameAnalysis.part_name: 这些形容词均含"准确的，正确的"之意。
sameAnalysis.word_list: accurate, exact, precise, right, true, correct
means: accurate ：指通过谨慎的努力达到符合事实或实际，侧重不同程度的准确性，与事实无出入。
exact ：着重在质与量方面的准确，语气比accurate强。
precise ：侧重极端准确，更强调细节的精确无误。
right ：使用广泛，可与这些词中的correct换用，但常暗示道德、理解、行动等方面的正确。
true ：暗指绝对准确，尤指复制品与原件丝毫不差。
correct ：最常用词，主要指按一定标准或规则来衡量，没有谬误和差错或无缺点错误。

sameAnalysis.part_name: 这些形容词均含有"忠实的"之意。
means: faithful ： 多指对人对事或对诺言、誓言的始终不渝，侧重在任何情况下都绝不改变。
loyal ： 一般指对祖国、领袖的忠诚或对事业、原则、誓言的忠实，不动摇。
constant ： 侧重指思想状态的稳定或信念的坚定，也指爱情或感情等的忠贞不渝。
true ： 侧重个人感情上的忠实和不动摇。

sameAnalysis.part_name: 这些形容词均有"真的，真实的，实在的"之意。
sameAnalysis.word_list: genuine, authentic, actual, real, true, factual
means: genuine ： 普通常用词，指真正的，货真价实的，强调非人为或非虚假的。
authentic常可与genuine换用，指与事实完全相符，强调准确可靠。
actual ： 指事物的实际存在，并非出自主观臆造。
real ： 普通用词，含义较广，有时可与actual和genuine换用。指一切真实的或 表面看不出虚假的事物。
true ： 指同实际情况或标准完全一致。口语中多用。
factual与actual同义，但更测重根据事实，不扩大或缩小，不渲染。

stems_affixes.value_cn: 真实的, 真正的, 忠实的
stems_affixes.word_buile: tru相信,真实+e→adj.真实的, 真正的, 忠实的
trust[n.&v.信任, 信赖]+ful表形容词→adj.相信的, 信任的
tru相信,真实+ly表副词→adv.真实地, 不假
tru相信,真实+ce→相信对方而停战
dis不+trust[n.&v.信任, 信赖]→n.不相信,怀疑 v.不信任,疑惑
tru相信,真实+ism学术→真实的学术→不言自明的真理
tru相信,真实+th表名词→n.真实,真相;真实性;真理
tru相信,真实+st→n.&v.信任, 信赖
dis不+trust[n.&v.信任, 信赖]→n.不相信,怀疑 v.不信任,疑惑
en给予+trust[n.&v.信任, 信赖]→给予相信→委托

word_mean: 具备一切证实其特性所需条件的

sentences.en: It is a true story.
sentences.cn: 那是个真实的故事。

sentences.en: He is always true to his friends.

sentences.en: I think the painter has produced a very true likeness.
sentences.cn: 我认为这位画家画得非常逼真。

sentences.en: You have to admit that these sketches are true to life.
sentences.cn: 你得承认这些素描很逼真。

sentences.en: If the door's not exactly true it won't close properly.
sentences.cn: 这扇门如果安得不正确就关不上。

sentences.en: It would be truer to say that he was careless than that he was unkind.
sentences.cn: 与其说他待人苛刻倒不如说粗心更准确。</seg>

entry.def: If something is true, it is based on facts rather than being invented or imagined, and is accurate and reliable.
entry.tran: 基于事实的;真实的;如实的;可信的

example.ex: Everything I had heard about him was true...
example.tran: 我听说的关于他的一切都是真实的。

example.ex: He said it was true that a collision had happened…

entry.def: You use true to emphasize that a person or thing is sincere or genuine, often in contrast to something that is pretended or hidden.
entry.tran: (感情)真实的，真挚的；（物品）真的，真正的,正品的

example.ex: I allowed myself to acknowledge my true feelings...
example.tran: 我愿意承认我的真实感情。

example.ex: The true cost often differs from that which had first been projected...
example.tran: 实际成本经常与最初计划的有所不同。

entry.def: If you use true to describe something or someone, you approve of them because they have all the characteristics or qualities that such a person or thing typically has.
entry.tran: 纯粹的;真正的;名副其实的

example.ex: This country professes to be a true democracy…
example.tran: 这个国家自称是真正的民主政体。

example.ex: Maybe one day you'll find true love...
example.tran: 也许有一天你会找到真爱。

entry.def: If you say that a fact is true of a particular person or situation, you mean that it is valid or relevant for them.

example.ex: I accept that the romance may have gone out of the marriage, but surely this is true of many couples...
example.tran: 我同意婚姻里可能已经没有了浪漫这一说法，而且很多夫妻都的确如此。

example.ex: Expenditure on health in most of these countries has gone down, and the same is true for education.
example.tran: 这些国家的医疗支出大多已经下降，教育支出也是如此。

entry.def: You can use true in order to admit that a fact or opinion is real or valid before indicating that you think that it is not important or relevant in the circumstances.

example.ex: It's true she gets madly impatient with him, but what mother doesn't?…
example.tran: 她确实对他极其不耐烦，但哪个母亲不是这样呢？

example.ex: The state, it is true, gave money towards their wages. Nevertheless the whole process had not been organized properly…
example.tran: 诚然，政府已经拨款支付他们的工资。但整个过程没有组织妥当。

entry.def: If you are true to someone, you remain committed and loyal to them. If you are true to an idea or promise, you remain committed to it and continue to act according to it.
entry.tran: 忠实的;忠诚的;恪守(诺言、思想等)的

example.ex: David was true to his wife...
India has remained true to democracy...
example.tran: 印度一直奉行民主政治。

entry.def: If a dream, wish, or prediction comes true, it actually happens.
entry.tran: (梦想、愿望或预言)成真，成为现实

example.ex: Many of his predictions are coming true…
example.tran: 他的很多预言正成为现实。

example.ex: Owning a place of their own is a dream come true for the couple.
example.tran: 这对夫妇拥有了自己的房子，终于梦想成真了。

entry.def: If a general statement holds true in particular circumstances, or if your previous statement holds true in different circumstances, it is true or valid in those circumstances.
entry.tran: 同样适用;在…情况下亦然

example.ex: This law is known to hold true for galaxies at a distance of at least several billion light years.
example.tran: 据知，这条定律同样适用于距离至少几十亿光年之远的星系。

entry.def: If you say that something seems too good to be true, you are suspicious of it because it seems better than you had expected, and you think there may something wrong with it that you have not noticed.

example.ex: On the whole the celebrations were remarkably good-humoured and peaceful. Indeed, it seemed almost too good to be true.
example.tran: 总体上，庆典活动一派快乐祥和。事实上，简直好得让人难以置信。

entry.def: If you say that something such as a story or a film is true to life, you approve of it because it seems real.
entry.tran: 栩栩如生;逼真;活灵活现

example.ex: The opening scenes of this movie are just not true to life.
example.tran: 这部电影开场的几幕真是太假了。

means.word_mean: 1. proper alignment; the property possessed by something that is in correct or proper alignment;
1. make level, square, balanced, or concentric;

sentences.sentence: "true up the cylinder of an engine"

means.word_mean: 1. consistent with fact or reality; not false;

sentences.sentence: "it is undesirable to believe a proposition when there is no ground whatever for supposing it true"- B. Russell

means.word_mean: 2. not synthetic or spurious; of real or natural origin;

sentences.sentence: "the horseshoe crab is not a true crab"

means.word_mean: 5. devoted (sometimes fanatically) to a cause or concept or truth;

sentences.sentence: "true believers bonded together against all who disagreed with them"

means.word_mean: 6. expressing or given to expressing the truth;

sentences.sentence: "I would be true for there are those who trust me"

means.word_mean: 8. not pretended; sincerely felt or expressed;

sentences.sentence: "a spirit which true men have always admired"

means.word_mean: 10. determined with reference to the earth's axis rather than the magnetic poles;
14. reliable as a basis for action;

sentences.sentence: "true, she is the smartest in her class"

derivation.yuyuan_name: Old English trēowe, tr y̅we 'steadfast, loyal'; related to Dutch getrouw, German treu, also to truce

means: 真正的
真实的
忠实的
正确的
真正地
确实地
正确地
正当地

sentences.cn: 标出下列说法是对还是错。
sentences.en: Indicate whether the following statements are true or false .

sentences.cn: 她要走是真的吗？
sentences.en: Is it true she's leaving?

sentences.cn: 所有的传闻结果都确有其事。
sentences.en: All the rumours turned out to be true.

sentences.cn: 那不完全正确。
sentences.en: That's not strictly (= completely) true.

sentences.cn: 这部小说是根据真实的故事写成的。
sentences.en: The novel is based on a true story .

sentences.cn: 他的借口听起来就不真实。
sentences.en: His excuse just doesn't ring (= sound) true .

sentences.cn: 遗憾的是，这些调查结果不适用于妇女和儿童。
sentences.en: Unfortunately, these findings do not hold true (= are not valid) for women and children.

sentences.cn: 音乐沉闷枯燥毫不动人，表演也是。
sentences.en: The music is dull and uninspiring, and the same is true of the acting.

sentences.cn: 你说的一点不假。
sentences.en: You never spoke a truer word (= used to emphasize that you agree with what sb has just said) .

sentences.cn: 资本主义的真实情况
sentences.en: the true face of capitalism (= what it is really like rather than what people think it is like)

sentences.cn: 这些实验对环境造成的确切代价在未来数年内是看不见的。
sentences.en: The true cost of these experiments to the environment will not be known for years to come.

sentences.cn: 他没有向什么人显露过他的真实性格。
sentences.en: He reveals his true character to very few people.

sentences.cn: 他们是真心相爱。
sentences.en: It was true love between them.

sentences.cn: 我听说的关于他的一切都是真实的。
sentences.en: Everything I had heard about him was true...

sentences.cn: 他说真的发生了冲突。
sentences.en: He said it was true that a collision had happened…

sentences.cn: 我愿意承认我的真实感情。
sentences.en: I allowed myself to acknowledge my true feelings...

sentences.cn: 实际成本经常与最初计划的有所不同。
sentences.en: The true cost often differs from that which had first been projected...

sentences.cn: 这个国家自称是真正的民主政体。
sentences.en: This country professes to be a true democracy…

sentences.cn: 也许有一天你会找到真爱。
sentences.en: Maybe one day you'll find true love...

sentences.cn: 我同意婚姻里可能已经没有了浪漫这一说法，而且很多夫妻都的确如此。
sentences.en: I accept that the romance may have gone out of the marriage, but surely this is true of many couples...

sentences.cn: 这些国家的医疗支出大多已经下降，教育支出也是如此。
sentences.en: Expenditure on health in most of these countries has gone down, and the same is true for education.

sentences.cn: 她确实对他极其不耐烦，但哪个母亲不是这样呢？
sentences.en: It's true she gets madly impatient with him, but what mother doesn't?…

sentences.cn: 诚然，政府已经拨款支付他们的工资。但整个过程没有组织妥当。
sentences.en: The state, it is true, gave money towards their wages. Nevertheless the whole process had not been organized properly…

sentences.cn: 戴维忠于妻子。
sentences.en: David was true to his wife...

sentences.cn: 印度一直奉行民主政治。
sentences.en: India has remained true to democracy...

sentences.cn: 他的很多预言正成为现实。
sentences.en: Many of his predictions are coming true…

sentences.cn: 这对夫妇拥有了自己的房子，终于梦想成真了。
sentences.en: Owning a place of their own is a dream come true for the couple.

sentences.cn: 据知，这条定律同样适用于距离至少几十亿光年之远的星系。
sentences.en: This law is known to hold true for galaxies at a distance of at least several billion light years.

sentences.cn: 总体上，庆典活动一派快乐祥和。事实上，简直好得让人难以置信。
sentences.en: On the whole the celebrations were remarkably good-humoured and peaceful. Indeed, it seemed almost too good to be true.

sentences.cn: 这部电影开场的几幕真是太假了。
sentences.en: The opening scenes of this movie are just not true to life.

sentences.cn: 他被认为是发明第一架真正的直升机的人。
sentences.en: He is credited with inventing the first true helicopter.

sentences.cn: 这个国家自称是真正的民主政体。
sentences.en: This country professes to be a true democracy…

sentences.cn: 然而，真正的无现金社会可能不会马上到来。
sentences.en: However，a true cashless society is probably not around the corner.

sentences.cn: 真正的、改变了我为人本身的批评就是从那时开始的。
sentences.en: That was when true criticism, the type that changed me as a person, began.

sentences.cn: 但是，在亚里士多德——柏拉图的学生、亚历山大大帝的老师——看来，大多数人际关系都算不上真正的朋友关系。

sentences.cn: 文学以普通人为描写对象,才能发挥它真正的功能.
sentences.en: Literature came nearest to its true function when it dealt with common people.

sentences.cn: 这种预期的名称的变更,反映了该集团的真正的独立市场.
sentences.en: This anticipated name change reflects the group's true independence in the marketplace.

sentences.cn: 这是一个真正的足球人该`明白的事实.
sentences.en: That is a fact that a true football man would know.

sentences.cn: 任何修习者都可以模仿这一招式, 但若没有激情,便会缺乏真正的力量.
sentences.en: Any aspirant can mimic the style, but without passion the movements will lack true power.

sentences.cn: 一个真正的朋友会握着你的手,触动你的心弦!
sentences.en: A true friend is the one who holds your hands and touches your heart.

sentences.cn: 当然, 洛根皮卡熊一个真正的洛根的所有特征.
sentences.en: Naturally, Logan Pickup bears all the hallmarks of a true Logan.

sentences.cn: 真正的朋友不仅能握住你的双手,而且能触及你的心灵.

sentences.cn: 所有真正的爱情是性无法使其相形见绌的顶点.
sentences.en: All true love is a peak which sexuality cannot dwarf.

sentences.cn: 有人点灯求光明, 其实真正的光明在我们心里.
sentences.en: Many seek illumination by lighting up a lamp, when the true light is within.

sentences.cn: 弗拉基米尔?波可夫曾说, 真正的评论家读书时用的不是大脑,而是脊梁骨.
sentences.en: THE true critic, Vladimir Nabokov once observed, reads not with his brain but with his backbone.

sentences.cn: 对自己的错误后悔到不致重犯的程度是真正的后悔.
sentences.en: To regret one's errors to the point of not repeating them is true repentance.

sentences.cn: 投资未来的人,才是真正的现实主义者.
sentences.en: People who invest the future are the true realists.

sentences.cn: 当你功成名就, 你会有一些虚假的朋友和一些真正的朋友; 不管怎样,你还是要取得成功.
sentences.en: If you are successful , you will win some false friends and some true friends; succeed anyway.

sentences.cn: 真正的同情是什么?
sentences.en: What is true compassion?

sentences.cn: 然而, 伦纳德并没有掌握真正的科学方法.
sentences.en: Nevertheless, Leonardo did not fully grasp the true method of science.

sentences.cn: 真正的科学最重要的是教人怀疑和知道自己无知.

sentences.cn: 这里所说的不是读取那些能够快速读出且能检验正误的绝对的、确定的或“真实的”意思，也不是读取文本与世界的某些永恒联系。

sentences.cn: 所以，我们要么让纳税人承担学生的学费，而代价是让他们指定学生学习的内容。要么我们就让学生自己选择专业，但同时也要自己支付教育费用。不过说到底，以下二者必有一个是正确的：
sentences.en: So we can have taxpayers pick up students’ tuition in exchange for dictating what those students will study. Or we can allow students both to choose their majors and pay for their education themselves. But in the end, one of two things is true:

sentences.cn: 到现在为止,这仍然是一条真理,也是我在工作中所积累的经验.
sentences.en: This remains true and we have by now a good deal of experience in the matter.

sentences.cn: 真理;事实真实的事物, 如陈述 、 原则或信念等, 尤指持久的真理.
sentences.en: Something, such as a statement, principle, or belief, that is true , especially an enduring truth.

sentences.cn: 祂正在建立一个国度,属祂的子民也将会具备真理 、 谦卑和公义.
sentences.en: He is building a kingdom in which his subjects too will be true, humble and righteous.

sentences.cn: 这是真理, 没有丝毫的虚假, 是确凿之最确凿的真理.
sentences.en: True, without falsehood, certain, most certain.

sentences.cn: 这是一条放之四海而皆准的普遍真理.
sentences.en: It is universal truth that holds true for the whole world.

sentences.cn: 这是没有谎言的真理, 最确凿的真理.
sentences.en: Tis true without lying, certain most true.

sentences.cn: 圣经是神赐给我们的属灵礼物, 是永生神的权威话语,是绝对真理.
sentences.en: The Bible is God's Spirit - given, absolutely true and dynamically powerful word.

sentences.cn: “真理”说过的话中,当属此句最有道理.
sentences.en: Truth never said a truer word.

sentences.cn: 科学的进展既有赖于发现真理,又有赖于摒弃谬误.
sentences.en: Science advances both by finding out what is true and by eliminating what is false.

sentences.cn: 自明便是真理, 这一点一定要坚持.
sentences.en: Truisms are true, hold on to that!

sentences.cn: 在今日世界,有条真理和美国内战前的南方地区一样: 棉花为王.
sentences.en: Itas true in today's world as it was in the antebellum South: cotton is king.

sentences.cn: 在美国那不一定总是真理.
sentences.en: That is not at all true of America.

sentences.cn: 04一个先天就正确的思想,应该是一个自身的可能性就保证了其真理性.
sentences.en: An apriori true thought would be one whose possibility guaranteed its truth.

sentences.cn: 他说: 最伟大的殉难事迹代表了真理和正义.
sentences.en: He said: The greatest act of martyrdom is standing up for what is true and just.

sentences.cn: 博士头衔和实验室的白袍并不代表真理.
sentences.en: D. and a white lab coat says something doesn't make it true.

sentences.cn: 一个知觉的或概念的经验, 必须符合事实,才能成为真理.
sentences.en: An experience , perceptual or conceptual, must conform to reality in order to be true.

sentences.cn: 练习成就完美, 这是做任何事的真理.
sentences.en: Practice makes perfect. It is true in anything.

sentences.cn: 所有物体都拥有重量是真理.
sentences.en: It is true that all bodies possess weight.

sentences.cn: 悲伤的时候我们才意识到幸福的真理.
sentences.en: We realize the true worth of happiness when we are in sorrow.

sentences.cn: 真正的大师从不宣称自己把握了绝对真理.
sentences.en: True masters never claim to hold on to the absolute truth.

sentences.cn: 在科学领域中的一个反面的假设永远不能最终被证明是真理.
sentences.en: In science a negative hypothesis can never be proved conclusively true.

sentences.cn: 这展览不害羞 、 不害怕或妥协地断言达尔文的进化伦, 很简单, 就是真理.
sentences.en: It asserts without shame, fear or compromise that Darwin's theory of evolution is, quite simply, true.

sentences.cn: 我们不是一定要赢, 但我们非追求真理不可.
sentences.en: We are not bound to win, but we are bound to be true.

sentences.cn: 这对追求相反极性的人一样是真理.
sentences.en: It is just as true of these others of the opposite pole.

sentences.cn: 这是老调重弹了, 不过切记书中并非全是真理.
sentences.en: It's a cliche , but not eVery abundancething is true only since it were in a book.

sentences.cn: 这是个基本信条(必须承认其为真理).
sentences.en: This is a matter of doctrine, ie must be accepted as true.

sentences.cn: 我们总是先将似是而非的东西视为真理,将貌似相异的东西斥为谬误.
sentences.en: Our first impulse is to accept the plausible as true and to the uncongenial as false.

sentences.cn: 所以,爱情的代价就是如此, 如果得不到回爱,就会得到深藏心底的轻蔑,这是永恒的真理.
sentences.en: For it is a true rule , that love is ever rewardedwithwithand secret contempt.

sentences.cn: 协同原理在社会互动中也是真理.
sentences.en: The principle of synergy also holds true in social interactions.

sentences.cn: 我的口要发出真理.我的嘴憎恶邪恶.
sentences.en: My mouth speaks what is true, for my lips detest wickedness.

sentences.cn: 这部小说是根据真实的故事写成的。
sentences.en: The novel is based on a true story .

sentences.cn: 他的借口听起来就不真实。
sentences.en: His excuse just doesn't ring (= sound) true .

sentences.cn: 资本主义的真实情况
sentences.en: the true face of capitalism (= what it is really like rather than what people think it is like)

sentences.cn: 他没有向什么人显露过他的真实性格。
sentences.en: He reveals his true character to very few people.

sentences.cn: 我听说的关于他的一切都是真实的。
sentences.en: Everything I had heard about him was true...

sentences.cn: 我愿意承认我的真实感情。
sentences.en: I allowed myself to acknowledge my true feelings...

sentences.cn: 这里所说的不是读取那些能够快速读出且能检验正误的绝对的、确定的或“真实的”意思，也不是读取文本与世界的某些永恒联系。
sentences.en: What is in question is not the retrieval of an absolute, fixed or “true” meaning that can be read off and checked for accuracy, or some timeless relation of the text to the world. (43) _______

sentences.cn: 正确地给碳定价因此将有效地使碳用户支付的费用符合用碳的真实社会机会成本。
sentences.en: Setting the right carbon price will therefore efficiently align the costs paid by carbon users with the true social opportunity cost of using carbon.

sentences.cn: 如果不能被正确的碳价矫正，化石燃料低廉的价格就不能向市场准确表明清洁能源真实的社会盈利能力。

sentences.cn: 国际劳工组织最近的一项报告称，全球实际工资情况的恶化引发了对经济复苏真实程度的质疑，尤其是政府的救济计划是否停止得过早。

sentences.cn: 另外, 从个股角度看, 还要考察净资产背后的真实价值.
sentences.en: Moreover, looking from the stock angle, but must inspect behind the net assets the true value.

sentences.cn: 你的愤怒是真实的, 因为它属于你的, 所有属于你的东西都是真实的.
sentences.en: Your anger is real, because it belongs to you, all your things are true.

sentences.cn: 所以我需要一个真实对我的女孩.
sentences.en: That's why I need a girl that be true to me.

sentences.cn: 理想, 你孤独而真实.
sentences.en: Ideal, you are lonely but true.

sentences.cn: 这本书很有趣, 似乎里面的人物都是真实的.
sentences.en: The book is interesting, as if the characters are true to life.

sentences.cn: 内含报酬率是项目在其寿命周期内所实现的真实收益率.
sentences.en: The internal rate of return represents the true interestearned in an investment over its economic life.

sentences.cn: 人们不禁要感到那些数学公式是独立存在的,并具有真实的内容.
sentences.en: One cannot help feeling that these mathematical formulas have an independent existence and a true intelligence.

sentences.cn: 输出的真值. 这是比较器的真实输出.
sentences.en: PIN 13 Output True. This is the comparator's true output.

sentences.en: First of all, they know it's not true.

sentences.cn: 我怀疑那是否真实.
sentences.en: I am doubtful whether it is true.

sentences.en: Hannibal Lecter: Spoken like a true Protestant.

sentences.en: They exposed the true aims of the war.

sentences.en: He's always around to make sure his true feelings stay hidden.

sentences.cn: 我断言在我的生活中有三个规则是真实的.
sentences.en: I have asserted three rules to be true in my life.

sentences.cn: 真实波动幅度反映了今天和昨天的波动.

sentences.cn: 肚子是最精确的时钟.
